title: OnePlus 3 Review
description: Ingat GADGET, ingat DROIDLIME...!Spesifikasi OnePlus 3:Harga: Rp7 jutaCPU: 4-core Snapdragon 820 2,15 GHzRAM: 6 GBStorage: 64 GBOS: H2OS (Android 6.0.1)Kamera: 13 MP + 8 MPLayar: AMOLED 5,5 inci (1.920 x 1.080 piksel)Baterai: 3.000 mAhSensor: Accelerometer, proximity, gyroscope, compass, fingerprintUSB OTG: YaScreen-on-time: 6 jamAnTuTu Benchmark 6.0: N/A (belum mendukung pengujian AnTuTu)Game di video ini:Sine Mora https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.digitalreality.sinemoraAssassin's Creed Identity https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ubisoft.assassinscreed.identityNever Alone: Ki Edition https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.eline.neveralonemobileReview by: DroidLime (Romi Hidayat)FB: DroidLime https://www.facebook.com/droidlimeTwitter: @droidlime https://twitter.com/droidlimeGPlus: DroidLime https://plus.google.com/+DroidlimeInstagram: https://instagram.com/droidlime/LINE@: @droidlime
